column4: Neolia Protective Apricot Oil Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Neolia Protective Apricot Oil Shampoo - Imported (400 ml) Price: Rs.2200

Neolia Protective Apricot Oil Shampoo for Coloured Hair 13. 5 fl oz (400 ml). Made with 100% organic apricot oil: rich in vitamins A and E and essential fatty acids such as Omega 9. Hydrating nourishing antioxidant regenerating and protective. Enriched with blueberries: concentration of antioxidants due to flavonoids. Concentration of vitamin C : protects the body against free radicals responsible for skin aging. Ideal for devitalized and dry skin. Enriched with honey: hydrating antioxidant softening antiseptic healing nourishing etc. It will satisfy dehydrated and dry skin as its high sugar content makes it able to keep water in the epidermis. Paraben Free No aminal ingredients nor tested on Biodegradable Gentle amp Hypoallergenic amp Recyclable. Formulated for dry skin. A rich and unctuous lather for soft and deeply hydrated skin. Benefits:Apricot Oil: Naturally rich in vitamins A and E and essential fatty acids such as Omega 9 this oil with hydrating nourishing emollient softening regenerating and protective virtues is in the core of products. It revitalizes skin and protects hair thanks to deep hydration for dry skin and a natural antioxidant action. Blueberries: Among about twenty fruits the blueberry comes first for its total antioxidant capacity thanks to flavonoids. Ideal for dry or devitalized skin it is often used in cosmetology as it relieves and regenerates the epidermis while refreshing and brightening the complexion. It is also a privileged ingredient for irritated skin as it acts as a calming and regenerating agent. Applied on scalp it is a tonic protective and vivifying care for hair. Honey: Honey is described as a product from the hive with a thousand virtues : hydrating antioxidant softening antiseptic healing nourishing etc. It will satisfy dry and dehydrated skin as its high sugar content makes it able to keep water in the epidermis. this is what is called a humectant property. Thus due to its capacity to retain water it deeply hydrates which has the effect of making skin smooth soft and nourished. Rich in mineral substances in vitamins and in amino acids honey softens tones and nourishes skin. Dull and devitalized skin will recover hydration suppleness softness and brightness. Thanks to honey you get natural beauty and a nourishing action for your skin and hair. Made in Canada

column4: Neolia Fortifying Olive Oil Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Neolia Fortifying Olive Oil Shampoo - Imported (400 ml) Price: Rs.2200

Neolia Fortifying Olive Oil Shampoo for Normal Hair 13. 5 fl oz (400 ml). Made with 100% organic extra virgin olive oil: Hydrating nourishing softening antioxydant regenerating and protective. Enriched with aloe vera: concentration of multivitamins and minerals with antiseptic anti-inflammatory and bactericidal actions. Paraben Free No aminal ingredients nor tested on Biodegradable Gentle amp Hypoallergenic amp Recyclable. For normal hair which needs hydration protection and softness. Benefits:Olive oil: Naturally rich in fatty acids and full of vitamins A and E this oil has moisturizing nourishing softening antioxidant regenerating and protective virtues and is the core of N olia reg products. It confers to skin and hair a youthful glow and a remarkable suppleness. Aloe vera: Rich in polysaccharides aloe vera also contains vitamines A B C E minerals calcium copper iron lithium magnesium manganese phosphorus potassium sodium zinc enzymes and essential amino acids. this plant has among other things antiseptic antiphlogistic and bactericidal properties. It favours healing regenerates cells rehydrates and nourishes all skin type. Moringa: Rich in insaturated fatty acids with 70-73% oleic acid but also in vitamins A B and C minerals potassium calcium and proteins. These seeds have antipolluting virtues which protect hair against daily aggressions from stress environmental pollution and UV rays. These strenghtening restorative and revitalizing properties are also very beneficial to hair. Made in Canada
